prompt: Create a website for a camera selling company, create a header, footer
refinedPrompt: Create a website for a camera selling company. Include a visually appealing header with the company logo and a navigation menu. Design an engaging homepage showcasing featured cameras, special offers, and customer reviews. Create dedicated pages for different camera categories and a detailed product page for each camera. Implement a user-friendly search functionality and filtering options. Add an intuitive shopping cart and secure checkout process. Include an informative footer with quick links, contact information, and social media icons.
